subject: ProStyle 3000 used at my salon - needs repair
body:
Hello,

I've been using my ProStyle 3000 at my home salon for the past month. I see about 5-6 clients a day. The motor burned out yesterday.

Purchased December 10, 2025 from Amazon. Serial: PS3K-2025-99887.

Order confirmation attached.

Patricia Garcia
432 Salon Street
Houston, TX 77001
713-555-0167

metadata.reason: ProStyle 3000 is for home use only, commercial/salon use is explicitly excluded
